name: Pluggable Storage Engine OO Framework
short_description: Pluggable Storage Engine Obejct-Oriented framework for MySQL 5.1. Provides a set of C++ base classes from which one descends to create a new PSE. Includes the base classes, utility code, debug code, and an example PSE based on PSE-OO called BlackhOOle.
